Package org.esupportail.commons.services.application

esup-commons versionning features.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ApplicationService The interface of application services, which should inform about the current application (version, name...).
VersionningService the interface of the beans for versionning management.
 

Class Summary
ApplicationUtils A class that provides static utilities for applications.
SimpleApplicationServiceImpl A simple implementation of ApplicationService.
Version A class that provides facilities with versionning.
VersionningUtils Utilities for versionning management.
VoidVersionningServiceImpl A versionning service that does nothing.
 

Exception Summary
RecallUpgradeException This esxception is thrown when the upgrade task should be recalled (a commit is needed before).
UninitializedDatabaseException An exception thrown when the database is not initialized.
VersionException An class to represent the exceptions thrown when dealing with application versions.
 

Package org.esupportail.commons.services.application Description

esup-commons versionning features.
